title: Fairly heavy rainfall expected in parts of the island
byline: The Department of Meteorology says that showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in most parts of the island during the afternoon or night.

title: Notice on bus and train services for today and tomorrow
byline: The National Transport Commission (NTC) has announced that passenger transport buses will be in operation starting today (15), based on public need.

title: El Salvador’s Bukele says he will not return man the US mistakenly deported
byline: El Salvador President Nayib Bukele said at the White House on Monday he had no plans to return a man mistakenly deported from the United States, suggesting that doing so would be like smuggling a terrorist into the country.

title: Police hunt for man who held 12-year-old girl captive in Keselwatta
byline: Police have launched an investigation into an incident where a girl sustained injuries after reportedly jumping from the second floor of a house on Peer Saibo Road in Keselwatta.

title: Six-year-old dead, several injured in Elpitiya accident
byline: A six-year-old girl has died in an accident reported along the Elpitiya-Ambalangoda road in Kurundugaha, Elpitiya this morning (Apr 15).

title: Tamil Nadu CM seeks more state powers from Central government
byline: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin is likely to move the State Autonomy resolution in the legislative Assembly today.
